extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite    Level 2 or perm of the dept. of Languages, Literatures and Cultures.
Exclusion    No more than 3.0 units from LLCU248; SPAN248
Equivalency    SPAN248.

basic.description: This survey course covers a vast area, several cultures, and many centuries. Students are expected to develop a general understanding of Spanish American culture through an examination of important historical, social, political, economic, and artistic developments in the area.
basic.subject: LLCU
basic.title: Spanish American Cultural Contexts
